law.catch_line: Articles of incorporation -- Executive committee of board -- Authority to act on board's behalf -- Bylaws.

text.section: The board shall develop articles of incorporation and appropriate documentation to establish its existence as a nonprofit corporation under KRS 58.180.
The board may establish from among its membership an executive committee, which shall have full authority to act between board meetings to the extent delegated by the board.
The board may enact bylaws concerning the election of officers and other administrative procedures it deems necessary.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000.
